      • updateServiceList

        @Transactional
public java.util.List<ServiceModel> updateServiceList()
        Reads through the log folder and updates the log services models in the database. skipping over the files that already in the database
        Uses the File class to get the list of files in the log folder, the files are check to be folder or file. files are checked if they already exist in the database if so they are skip, else they are added to the database. Folders are also skipped at the moment
        Specified by:
        updateServiceList in interface ServiceDAO
        Returns:
        List of all the added Service models
        See Also:
        ServiceDAO.updateServiceList()
